name: FLCOttawa
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: f. l. c. ottawa
des: Listen to the latest talks and sermons from Faith Lutheran Church Ottawa (FLC Ottawa). You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
